title: Tom Pidcock Confirms Mega-Move to Q36.5 after Ineos Grenadiers Divorce: ‘Things Are about to Get Lit’
content:
Pidcock signs with second-division Swiss squad on three-year deal: 'It’s an adventure and I’m excited for it.'

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock Confirms Mega-Move to Q36.5 after Ineos Grenadiers Divorce: ‘Things Are about to Get Lit’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
